doc.title: Common Sense Golf
doc.plot: We share common sense ideas that will help you get around the clubhouse and on the golf course. Basic golf knowledge, often assumed and rarely explained, is covered in a lighthearted and entertaining way. This unique approach is easy to follow and sure to make your golf experience far less intimidating and a lot more fun. We cover dozens of points including: purchasing equipment, setting a tee time, warming up, deciding who's shot it is, slow play, where and what are the hazards and out of bounds, repairing ball marks, divots, raking the bunker, proper treatment of the greens, club selection, how to improve your game, and the all important etiquette, to name just a few. In short, the Common Sense Golf approach to the game of golf is as entertaining as it is informative and acts as the spoon full of sugar that helps the medicine go down...
